item.title: Vampire Lock
item.description: I sculpted this vampiric lock on top of a real steel padlock and kept it functional. The inspiration for it was a drawing I made last year which you can find in my Sketchbook of December 2020 . My intent was to make something that feels old and a bit out of time and slightly threatening, something you think twice before unlocking. The completed and painted vampiric lock We used this lock in a recent photoshoot for our band Blood and dust .
